description: Cautleya cathcartii, also known as Cautleya, is an amazing plant species that adds unique beauty to gardens. This orchid grows relative easily in bright, indirect light, making it a great choice for anyone looking to add some color to their home. The blooms themselves are a breathtaking shade of yellow-green, creating a unique and striking effect. Aside from its beauty, Cautleya also has medicinal properties as it is known to aid in digestion. Because of this, and its bright petals, Cautleya was once considered a symbol of hope in Hindu traditions. With its unique color and interesting background, this amazing plant is sure to bring joy and beauty in any garden.
